member.name: T:WizardWrx.ClassAndMethodDiagnosticInfo
member.summary: The static methods in this class expose the internal name, source code file name, and source file line number from which calls to them originated.

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ClassAndMethodDiagnosticInfo.GetMyMethodName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the unqualified name of the calling method.
member.param: This parameter is configured as optional, and is set by the compiler to the unqualified name of the method that called it.
member.returns: The return value is the unqualified compile-time name of the method that called it

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ClassAndMethodDiagnosticInfo.GetMySourceFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the absolute (fully qualified) name of the source file in which the calling method is defined.
member.param: This parameter is configured as optional, and is set by the compiler to the absolute (fully qualified) name of the source file in which the method that called it is defined.
member.returns: The return value is the absolute (fully qualified) name of the file, indicated by , in which the call originated.

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ClassAndMethodDiagnosticInfo.GetMySourceLineNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the line number in the source file at which the call arose.
member.param: This parameter is configured as optional, and is set by the compiler to the line number in the source file where the call originated.
member.returns: The return value is the line number indicated by integer where the call arose.

member.name: T:WizardWrx.ObjectPropertyEnumerators
member.summary: This class exposes static methods for enumerating properties of objects.

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ObjectPropertyEnumerators.ListObjectProperties(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Enumerate the properties of an object, showing the value of each, as a formatted listing.
member.param: Name of object as it appears in the calling routine
Reference to the object from which to enumerate properties
Optional left padding for the report
Optional supplementary label information for the object
Binding flags mask, which determines which properties are enumerated

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ObjectPropertyEnumerators.ListObjectProperties2String(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Enumerate the properties of an object, showing the value of each, as a formatted listing string.
member.param: Name of object as it appears in the calling routine
Reference to the object from which to enumerate properties
Optional left padding for the report
Optional supplementary label information for the object
Binding flags mask, which determines which properties are enumerated
member.returns: The return value is a string constructed from the strings that would have been written on the console by ListObjectProperties.

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ObjectPropertyEnumerators.ListObjectPropertyTypesAndValues(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Enumerate the properties of an object, showing for each its type and value, as a formatted listing.
member.param: Name of object as it appears in the calling routine
Reference to the object from which to enumerate properties
Optional left padding for the report
Optional supplementary label information for the object
Binding flags mask, which determines which properties are enumerated

member.name: M:WizardWrx.ObjectPropertyEnumerators.ListObjectPropertyTypesAndValues2String(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Enumerate the properties of an object, showing for each its type and value, as a formatted listing.
member.param: Name of object as it appears in the calling routine
Reference to the object from which to enumerate properties
Optional left padding for the report
Optional supplementary label information for the object
Binding flags mask, which determines which properties are enumerated
member.returns: The return value is a string constructed from the strings that would have been written on the console by ListObjectProperties.

member.name: T:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.ERRMSG_PROPERTY_LIST
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} Property {1}: {2} = {3}.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.MSG_PROP_TYPE_AND_VALUE_DETAIL
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} Property {1}: {2} ({3}) = {4}.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.MSG_PROPERTY_LIST_DETAIL
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} Property {1}: {2} = {3}.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.MSG_PROPERTY_LIST_FOOTER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {1}{0}End of list{1}.

member.name: P:WizardWrx.Properties.Resources.MSG_PROPERTY_LIST_HEADER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {4}{0}Object {1}{2} exposes the following {3} public properties:{4}.
